text:
The installation instructions for compiling and running the src code version of
jakarta seem to be outdated - they refer to downloading and installing the
jakarta-servletapi code, but I cannot find that on jakarta.apache.org anywhere.
creator: frumkinj@u.library.arizona.edu
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Work is under way on fixing the docs. Jakarta-servletapi is in the CVS, 
but the build works fine without it.
